testcase.name: testing the data tables web page
testcase.system-out: Given user is ont the datatables home page..................................passed When user clicks on new button..............................................passed And user enters first name "first name".....................................passed And user enters last name "last name".......................................passed And user enters position "Sdet".............................................passed And user enters office "London".............................................passed And user enters extension "123".............................................passed And user enters start date "2020-06-01".....................................passed And user enters salary "60000"..............................................passed And user clicks create button...............................................passed And user enters fist name "first name" on the search box....................passed Then user should see name "first name" on the top of the table..............passed
